// URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/GREEDY
// Greedy Government
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	 int n, m;
	 scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
	 if(m == 0 && n == 0){printf("0\n"); continue;}
	 printf("%d\n", m / 2 + n / 2 + 1);
	}
	 
	 return 0;
}
